name: cli-config
description: Simple 'one call' API to convert your lib into a command line interface. Merges system & user settings, CLI options & actions, environment var, app overrides and package.json into one config object. Validates option names and run custom validator. Optionally selects a command exported by your libs and executes it. BYO YAML/CoffeeScript or any other parser to support non-JSON file formats.
